CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Power Grid relative to Meridian Energy Network?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Power Grid is {below} Meridian Energy Network in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Energy Network relative to Aethelgard Power Grid?
SRP.A: Meridian Energy Network is {above} Aethelgard Power Grid in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Energy Network}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total electricity demand?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aethelgard Power Grid}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Energy Network's minimum Electricity Demand in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Energy Network's minimum Electricity Demand is in {2009}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Power Grid's minimum Electricity Demand in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Power Grid's minimum Electricity Demand is in {2021}.

NC.Q: Between 2012 and 2016, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 2004 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 2012 and 2016 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2014.

NC.Q: Between 2012 and 2014, did the total Electricity Demand experience a larger or smaller change than between 2008 and 2018?
NC.A: The change in total electricity demand between 2012 and 2014 was {smaller} than between 2008 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2009 and 2015, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 2004 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 2009 and 2015 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2017 and 2021, was the average total Electricity Demand higher or lower than between 2008 and 2016?
NC.A: The average total electricity demand between 2017 and 2021 was {lower} than between 2008 and 2016.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Energy Network} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Power Grid and Meridian Energy Network first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Power Grid and Meridian Energy Network did not exchange leading positions.
